## colombianBP (Nicolas Hoyos)

this presentations shows a few relationships taken form the variables available on `mtcars`


## A little look at our data

```{r echo = TRUE}
summary(head(mtcars))
```

## The relationship between miles per galon and number of cylinders

```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
plot_ly(data=mtcars,x=~cyl,y=~mpg,type='box')
```

## Displacement vs horse power vs Weight

```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
plot_ly(data=mtcars,x=~disp,y=~hp,z=~wt,type = "scatter3d")

```
